title: Operating Knowledge-Building Communities Using Dual Authenticity Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of Fundamental Social Science Concepts and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Social knowledge-building activities reflecting learners' identities and interests while connecting daily life with school learning.

learning_goals: Lead knowledge-building communities on social topics in HKBC environments with over 80% autonomy
Generate and negotiate at least three socially exploratory questions reflecting personal identity and interests
Perform knowledge-sharing and feedback activities with peer learners at least twice using mobile devices
Improve learning processes by over 70% based on formative assessment data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
